features: ASTONISHINGLY SMOOTH - Cremo shaving cream contains unique molecules that become impossibly slick when mixed with water, so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin and gives you a close, comfortable shave
FOR TODAY'S MAN - Our same impossibly slick formula with a with added features to support sensitive skin including no synthetic fragrance and an essential oil blend known to help soothe skin
QUALITY - Enjoy a clean, comfortable shave with the Cremo shave cream for men while fighting nicks, razor burn and irritation

BARBER GRADE EXPERIENCE - Created with the highest of standards, our mens shaving products are designed with an acute attention to detail so you can feel your best, just like you would at any respectable barbershop
VALUE - Each bottle of our mens shaving cream contains a 90-day supply, which lasts longer than average shave cream or shave gel
body.description: Our shave creams are made of super-slick molecules that provide a slippery interface between sharp blade and sensitive skin; you'll enjoy an effortlessly close shave while fighting razor burn and skin irritation. Each Cremo Shave Cream is formulated to make your grooming ritual quick, reliable and even enjoyable. Inspired by the latest insights of cosmetic science and a deep respect for tradition, Cremo promises no gimmicks and no fluff. That's the difference between shave cream and shave cream with soul

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What does Barber Grade mean? Astonishing performance, superior ingredients and dramatic results. Just think of a barbershop and the people who work there. There’s pride, professionalism and passion That’s the feeling we’ve captured in every Barber Grade Product. Products we’ve created with astonishingly high standards - to meet your standards. Not the easy way. Not the cheapest way. The Cremo way. Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream Sensitive Skin Formula Unscented Fight Razor Burn Cremo Sensitive Shave Cream is uniquely designed combining our legendary base of impossibly slick, highly concentrated formula with added features to support sensitive skin. Specifically, it contains no synthetic fragrance, incorporates an essential oil blend known to help soothe skin, while continuing to provide a close, comfortable shave. It’s every bit as slick as our Original Shave Cream burn-fighting formula that made us famous. Gives you a close, comfortable shave Impossibly slick formula Leaves skin astonishingly smooth No synthetic fragrance

Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream A close shave with virtually any blade Cremo Barber Grade Shave Cream creates an ultra-slick surface so your blade can glide effortlessly over skin. No matter what kind of blade you use. Fights nicks, razor burn and skin irritation Impossibly slick, highly concentrated formula contains no synthetic fragrance, incorporates an essential oil blend known to help soothe skin. The Barber Grade Experience Combine with the Cremo Barber Grade Razor and Sensitive Post Shave Balm for a true barbershop shave, in the comfort of your own home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth and scent-free
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate not being bombarded by 20 different scents in my grooming routine, so this was a happy discovery. I've never had a smoother shave and have tried any number of products over the last 30 years, give or take, since I started shaving. Grateful to my friend who lent me hers whilst traveling!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great item - I use other CREMO items and this works great
reviews.reviewText: If you have sensitive skin, I advise this. It didn't take much, and I used a little water to thin it out. Made it slicker. I put a little on my neck and used wet fingers to spread. The combination of safety razors/blades and this. I have no nicks or razor burns. It's a very slick item. And not sticky or oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: My skin gets very irritated when I shave to the point I can only shave every other day. This was the fifth cream I've tried and hands down this is the best. I have no more red marks on my face after I shave. I'm so happy I found this. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes skin soft
reviews.reviewText: Does a good job, moisturizes well!! It is much thinners than same brand with other fragrances so be prepared for it to come out fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves this shaving cream. Good for sensitive skin while also helping to keep a close shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only need to use very small amount. Works great with my Panasonic Arc 5 razor. I rinse the razor several times while shaving and it makes this cream work even better with the razor head dripping wet. Low odor and really does work great for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not For Acne Prone Skin
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the sensitive skin option hoping it would reduce my chances of breaking out, but unfortunately it irritated my skin and I quickly stopped using this product on my face. Overall, the product works well for shaving, but again not if you’re prone to acne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always suffered from ingrown hairs and shaving issues. This product has been fantastic! I use it as the first layer , then apply some Aveeno to give more foam. Great shave, no skin problems. I will repurchase.
